Package oop.collections

Class Surgery

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.collections.Surgery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Surgery>
    public class Surgery
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Surgery>
    The Surgery class represents a surgical procedure. It provides information such as id, title, severity, duration, and whether a doctor is required.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int duration
      The duration of the surgery in minutes.
      private int id
      The unique identifier of the surgery.
      private boolean needsDoctor
      Indicates whether a doctor is required for the surgery.
      private int severity
      The severity of the surgery.
      private java.lang.String title
      The title of the surgery.

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(Surgery other)
        Compares this surgery with another surgery based on severity. Surgeries are compared by severity.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Surgery>
        Parameters:
        other - The surgery to be compared.
        Returns:
        An integer value representing the comparison result.
